thread.title: Great stay for work - will be back!
thread.title_full: Great stay for work - will be back! - Review of Luna & Simone Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: BettyMoos
title: Great stay for work - will be back!
text:
I stayed here for 3 nights with work. The location is great meaning I could walk everywhere, and the room itself was lovely. Spotlessly clean, comfy bed, good facilities, and a spotless bathroom with great hot shower. The breakfasts were convenient too as they were fast. I am back here staying tonight, and will hopefully have just as great a stay!
Room Tip: Room 8 is lovely on the front with French doors. See more room tips
